title: Swain rework thoughts
body:
Swain has been my identity champion for years of league so i wanted to give my opinion on his up coming rework.

* Things to Preserve

1)  I think it will be good to change his very linear play style but i hope u preserve his ult which is his core identity as swain and the coolest part of his kit and his character. _"EDIT - keep ult as in just keep the transformation into a demon raven not the health drain or as an ultimate ability in particular._"

2)  I would also like to say that his current splash and in-game portrait is alpha AF (Red-eyes-alpha-stare, face scarf, posture on the throne and dark raven theme) so i hope it is taken into consideration if/when changing them for all the swain players that like male doalminance XD. 

3)  The other would be his calm and non-reactive character in his bio as the master tactician in the shadows of Noxus. 

4)  The Tyrant Swain skin also has +10 presence when equipped (also very bad@ss skin and splash, take into consideration when chaninging them).

* Things to change

1)  Base model, very disturbing if u do not have Tyrant or Northern Front. Funky blue hair and clothing needs to be changed to his current splash or completely changed. The "skirt" theme is the a big problem and would be more appropriate if it was more like Bilgwater/Nothern Front where the legs are partially shown. This is also somewhat present in the Tyrant swain but i think the long royal dress suits him (i think it should be cut in the middle so that it covers the back and legs which should be partially visible.)

2)  Skill set can reflect his title as the "Master Tactician" as right now he is a very immobile drain tank. Perhaps mobility or long range cc/abilities to impact the map somehow 

3)  Lastly Dragon Master Swain. I'll give u an idea to start, how about its an ultimate skin, he can change into different elemental dragons and combine other elements to produce more advanced elemental dragons :DDD -  its been a few years since its been confirmed  (5 years)
